header.title: PrestaShop Google Shopping
header.text: PrestaShop Google Shopping makes it easy to connect your store with Google, so you can showcase your products to millions of shoppers across Google Search, Shopping, Gmail, YouTube, and the Display Network.

content1.title: Connect your store to Google Merchant Center
content1.text: Connecting your store to Google Merchant Center allows you to upload store and product data to Google. Your products will automatically sync to make relevant information available for free listings, Google Ads, and other Google services.
content1.footer: You can create a new [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"] or link an existing account. Note that you’ll need to meet the Merchant Center [eligibility requirements]({1})[:target="_blank"] in order to connect your store.

content2.title: Reach online shoppers with free listings
content2.text: Free listings drive traffic by showcasing your products to customers who are actively looking for what you sell. Your products will appear on the Google Shopping tab, and can also appear on Google Search, Google Images, and Gmail depending on regional availability.

content3.title: Boost store traffic and sales with Google Ads
content3.text: Smart Shopping campaigns help you reach even more customers and grow your business by promoting your products across Google Search, Shopping, YouTube, Gmail, and the Display Network. They use Google’s technology to optimize your ads and automatically show your products to customers who are more likely to buy and spend more.

footer.text: Make your first steps with PrestaShop Google Shopping!

sectionTitle.smartShoppingCampaign: Launch your paid Smart Shopping campaign

onboarding.productFeedNotice: Google’s retail solutions can help you welcome more customers to your site or your store. After you get set up, you’ll have access to reports so you can see how well your ads are doing.
onboarding.warningMultistore: You can associate only one shop to your Prestashop Account.
onboarding.GMCAlreadyLinked: Your PrestaShop account is already linked to another store. You can associate only one store to a PrestaShop account. To associate this other store you have to unlink the associated one.

psAccountCard.disonboardedText: Authorize your account to manage your shop’s services
psAccountCard.onboardedText: Your shop is associated to the PrestaShop account of

googleAccountCard.title: Google account
googleAccountCard.introDisabled: When you are done connecting your PrestaShop account you will be able to connect your Google accounts.
googleAccountCard.introEnabled: A Google Account lets you access your Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts
googleAccountCard.footerDissociating: Dissociating your Google account will disconnect your Google Merchant Center and your Google Ads accounts.
googleAccountCard.alertCantConnect: You can't connect to your Google account right now. Refresh and try again later.
googleAccountCard.alertTokenMissing: The account token is missing. Try again to connect to your Google account or switch to another one.

mcaCard.title: Make your products available to shoppers accross Google
mcaCard.introDisabled: Associate your Merchant Center account to get your store and products information into Google
mcaCard.introEnabled: [Google Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"] helps you get your store and product info into Google and make it available to shoppers across Google.
mcaCard.labelSelect: Connect an existing Merchant Center account
mcaCard.claimCollides: Your current website claim collides with an existing claim
mcaCard.claimOverwrite: To finalize your Google Merchant Center account creation, you need to overwrite the existing claim.
mcaCard.footerEU:
If you are in the European Economic Area or Switzerland your Merchant Center account must be associated with a [Comparison Shopping Service (CSS)]({0})[:target="_blank"]  
If you create a new Merchant Center account through this application, it will be associated with Google Shopping, Google’s CSS, by default. You can change the CSS associated with your account at any time. [Find your CSS Partners]({1})[:target="_blank"]  
Once you have set up your Merchant Center account you can use our onboarding tool regardless of which CSS you use.
mcaCard.shopInfoMissingDescription: To check if it is a validity issue or if you are not following our rules, please log in to your account at
mcaCard.toUseGmcNeedsAdminAccess: To use an existing Google Merchant Center account, you must have Administrator access.
mcaCard.linkingFailed: You can't connect to your Merchant Center account right now. Try again later.
mcaCard.tryAgainLater: We can’t verify or claim the current site. Try again later.
mcaCard.unlinkFailed: Disconnection failed. Please refresh the page and try again.

mcaRequirements.title: Create new Merchant Center account
mcaRequirements.legend: To use Google Ads, you must acknowledge that you meet these requirements by checking these boxes.
mcaRequirements.legend2:
Before you can upload product data, your store’s website URL needs to be verified and claimed.  
Verification lets Google know you are the authorized owner of your website. Claiming associates your website URL with your Google Merchant Center account.

shoppingAdsPolicies.title: Shopping Ads policies
shoppingAdsPolicies.description: Don’t promote prohibited content or use prohibited practice to advertise. Respect restricted content policy and quality standards for your ads and website.

accurateContactInformation.title: Accurate contact information
accurateContactInformation.description: According to the policy provide users with the information that they need to make informed decisions (currently 2 out of 3: e-mail, phone number or physical address)
accurateContactInformation.link: Discover how to provide relevant information

secureCheckoutProcess.title: Secure checkout process and collection of personal data
secureCheckoutProcess.description: Do not misuse information about user, nor collect it for unclear purposes or without appropriate security measures.
secureCheckoutProcess.link: Learn about irresponsible data collection & use

returnPolicy.title: Return policy
returnPolicy.description: Provide users with the information that they need to make informed decisions.
returnPolicy.link: Discover how to set up return policies

billingTerms.title: Billing terms and conditions
billingTerms.description: Provide users with the information that they need to make informed decisions.

mcaRequirements.websiteURLDescription: The website used to create your Merchant Center account
mcaRequirements.storeNameDescription: This name will appear in your Shopping ads.
mcaRequirements.labelReadAndAgree: By purchasing Shopping ads, I have read and agree to comply with [Google's terms and policies]({0})[:target="_blank"], including [Google’s Merchant Center terms of service]({1})[:target="_blank"], [Shopping ads policies]({2})[:target="_blank"], and [Google Ads Terms and Conditions]({3})[:target="_blank"].
mcaRequirements.alert: If one of these requirements is missing, your Merchant Center account will be disapproved.

productFeedCard.title: Send your products data to Google
productFeedCard.intro: Display your products either free on Google Shopping tab and/or paid Smart Shopping campaigns with Product feed
productFeedCard.introToConfigure: Submitting your product data to Google in the correct format is important for creating successful ads and free listings for your products. We use this data to make sure that it's matched to the right queries.
productFeedCard.alertSuccess: You are successfully opted in. Once your products are approved, they can appear in Shopping tab search results.
productFeedCard.alertFailed: The synchronization of your product feed failed. **[See possible reasons in Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"]**
productFeedCard.alertShippingSettingsMissing: Shipping settings are missing. Once your shipping settings configured, you will be able to sync your product data. **[Add shipping settings]({0})[:target="_blank"]**
productFeedCard.alertProductFeedDeactivated: If the product sync is deactivated, there will be no new products pushed into the GMC. The account itself will continue to exist and the products will expire after 30 days. This stops the catalog items to show on both Free Listings and the ad campaigns.
productFeedCard.alertProductFeedExists:
**A product feed already exists**  
<small>To activate free listing feature, you need to overwrite the exisitng product feed.</small>
productFeedCard.attributeDescription: With these attributes, you can organize your advertising campaigns in Google Ads and override the category automatically assigned by Google in some cases.
productFeedCard.alertGoogleIsReviewingProducts:
Google is currently reviewing your products.  

Once approved, your products can appear in Shopping tab search results.

productFeedSettings.noticeDataStored: Data are stored at each step but will be submitted only at the final step.

shipping.ifMultipleCountries: If multiple countries are selected, each product price will automatically be converted to the correct currency in Google. Your store must support the appropriate shipping and tax rates for customers in each selected country.
shipping.placeholderSelect: Select the countries where your products are available
shipping.cantFindCountry:
Can’t find a country? Only supported countries are listed. [Supported countries](//google.com)[:target="_blank"]

 Your shipping services must be configured for the country you are targeting. Please respect [country-specific shopping policies](//google.com)[:target="_blank"] and [local regulation](//google.com)[:target="_blank"]
shipping.autoImportShippingDescription: PrestaShop will try to automatically import your shipping information from your store settings. You may need to provide additional information if we are unable to sync them automatically.
shipping.manualShipping: Manually set up shipping settings in Google Merchant Center
shipping.manualShippingDescription: You will go to Google Merchant Center and enter your product shipping information yourself. Your products won’t sync until you do this.
shipping.taxSettingsDescription: So that users understand the exact price that they’ll have to pay for a product, you must submit the taxes that you collect. Select how you want to set up tax settings.
shipping.manualImportTax: Manually set up tax settings in Google Merchant Center
shipping.alertTaxes: So that users understand the exact price that they’ll have to pay for a product, you must submit the taxes that you collect.

export.prohibitedContentNotice: Please review the [prohibited content guidelines](//google.com)[:target="_blank"] to ensure that products in your feed don’t violate these policies.

attributeMapping.intro: Products that are eligible for enhanced listings will appear in content-rich formats on the Shopping tab, which may boost traffic and drive sales.
attributeMapping.introNotice: In addition to the attributes required for standard free listings, the following attributes are required to participate in enhanced listings. Performance may be limited unless you provide all attributes available in your region:
attributeMapping.toDescribeProducts: To describe my product attributes, please use:
attributeMapping.sellApparel: Do you sell apparel and accessories ?
attributeMapping.footerNotice1: These attributes are required for products for specific age group and apparel items for customers in Brazil, France, Germany, Japan, the UK, and the US.
attributeMapping.footerNotice2: We encourage submitting as many applicable attributes as possible to ensure accurate and comprehensive data.
attributeMapping.learnHowToSetupShippingSettings: Learn how to set up shipping
attributeMapping.learnRequirementsProductSpeficifacion: Learn more about requirements for the Shopping product data specification
attributeMapping.weWillRecoverTheseAttributes: For your products we will recover these attributes:

freeListingCard.title: Free listing for Google Shopping tab
freeListingCard.intro: Enable the free listing of your products on the Google Shopping tab
freeListingCard.seeFreeListing: See my free listing in Merchant Center
freeListingCard.googleDelay: Google usually takes 3-5 business days to review products.
freeListingCard.alertActivationSuccess: You have successfully activated the free listing of your products for Google Shopping tab for free.
freeListingCard.alertEnableFreeListing: Enable free listing to display your products on Google Shopping tab for free.
freeListingCard.alertProductFeedDisabled: The synchronization of your product feed is disabled. Products are still visible on your free listing but they will not be updated anymore and they will disappear from your free listing after 30 days.
freeListingCard.alertEnableFreeListingAndProductFeed: Enable free listing to display your products on Google Shopping tab for free. This action will cause the reactivation of the product feed.

googleAdsAccountCard.title: Connect your Google Ads account
googleAdsAccountCard.intro: Create adverstising campaigns for your products: find the right audience at the right time
googleAdsAccountCard.text: Once connected you may need to configure your billing settings in your Google Ads account.
googleAdsAccountCard.labelSelect: Connect an existing Google Ads account

smartShoppingCampaignCard.title: Smart Shopping Campaign
smartShoppingCampaignCard.intro: Enable the paid listing of your products with Smart Shopping Campaigns

syncStatus.title: Sync status
syncStatus.readyForExport: Product feed is ready for export
syncStatus.alert: To solve the synchronization issue, go to Help tab or [contact the customer support service](//google.com)[:target="_blank"].

productStatus.title: Product approval status
productStatus.description: After submitting your product feed, your products will be reviewed and assigned one of 6 statuses
productStatus.alert: Google usually takes 3-5 business days to review products.
productStatus.approvalStatusList: Not synced, Active, Partially active, Expiring, Pending, Disapproved.

approvalTable.description: Products with problems that couldn't be synced are listed below.

help.needHelp: Need help? Find here the documentation of this module.
help.couldntFindAnyAnswer: Couldn"t find any answer to your question?

glass.message:
Can't see Google secured browser?  
Hit Continue to relaunch the window and finish configuration.

You may need to activate popups in your browser to continue.

cta.learnAboutGoogleSolutions: Learn more about Google's retail solutions
cta.whyDidntWork: Check out why it didn’t work
cta.enableFreeListingAndProductFeed: Enable free listing and product feed

modal.textDisconnectGoogleAccount: You are about to disconnect Google account. This will remove access to Google, Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts.
modal.textDisconnectMCA: You are about to disconnect Google Merchant Center account. This will remove access to Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts.
modal.textOverwriteClaim:
The existing claim will be overwritten. This action will impact the previous account to become inactive and the existing campaigns - free listings and Google Shopping campaigns - tied to that claim to be paused.  
If you are running a different Google Shopping campaign, we recommend pausing the campaign.
modal.textDisableFreeListing:
By this action, your products will no longer be advertised on Google Shopping and your running campaigns will be paused.  
Your catalog export will be still running.
modal.textDisableProductFeed:
Products will continue to show on Free Listings until the product feed has expired after 30 days.  
Smart shopping campaigns will remain active as long as there are still active products in the merchant center - you will need to pause your campaigns.
modal.textEnableFreeListing: This action will also cause the reactivation of the product feed.
modal.textCancelProductFeed: You will lose all unsaved changes. You need to complete the whole process to submit your data.

tooltip.mustCheckAllRequirements: You must check if all requirements met.
tooltip.mustAgreeGoogleTerms: You must agree the Google terms

toast.googleAccountConnectedOnceSuccess: You have connected your Google account!
toast.attributesMapppingSuccess: Your attributes are successfully mapped. Once you click on ‘Save’ your products will be sent to Google
toast.MCAConnectedOnceSuccess: You have connected your Merchant Center account!

header.title: لا يجوز إرغام أحد على الانتماء إلى جمعية ما.
header.text: لا يدان أي شخص بجريمة بسبب أي عمل أو امتناع عن عمل لم يكن في حينه يشكل جرما بمقتضى القانون الوطني أو الدولي، كما لا توقع عليه أية عقوبة أشد من تلك التي كانت سارية في الوقت الذي ارتكب فيه الفعل الجرمي.
header.reinsurance:
- لا يعقد الزواج إلا برضا   
- يجب أن يستهدف التعليم
